Text: Trade Zone changes for Sea Robin Cc Faye has completed moving all of the facilities on your request EXCEPT meter because a deal that is booked on that meter had volumes with a status other than expected which means we have to work on that behind the scenes Below is a list of deals that were impacted by her moving all of the other meters I am bouncing the server and it wil take about minutes to complete After that you will have to get completely out of all open Sitara applications including the Launch Pad and get back in Open the deals listed below and make sure the location field on the deal exchange says inconsistent You should only be concerned with the exchanges for and forward Click Edit and then go to the location field and click on the ellipsis Click OK when the Facility dialogue box opens and the correct zone should appear automatically Before you tab out of that field make sure that the deal volume equals the expected volume If the volumes are not equal make a note of the expected volumes and how they are broken out because they will default to the deal volume as soon as you tab out If the volumes are different update them as necessary and then release the deal Repeat this for all exchanges for and forward and for all deals The second thing you need to do is identify any swaps that are linked to the physical forwards If none are linked then thats great because you wont have to worry about that If some exist you will have to update the swap to reflect the correct zone To do this you need to edit the swap go to the field location remove the current inconsistent one and add the correct zone Hopefully this makes sense Please call me if you have any questions I will follow up with you on the meter tomorrow Sitara ID Imelda Frayre x Forwarded by Imelda FrayreHOUECT on PM Faye Ellis PM To Imelda CT cc Chris CT Subject Trade Zone changes for Sea Robin Imelda the following is a list of the metersfacility numbers being requested to change the trade zone from SeaRobin to Offshore Facilities Meters Imelda my research have indicated that going forward the deals are expected volumes Faye

Re New Counterparty President Fellows of Harvard College Cc Everyone I apologize for all the emails going back and forth but hopefully we can put this one to rest soon London Credit have approved this CP for financial metals and I need to confirm if they are approved from a legal perspective as well I spoke to Justin Boyd London legal and he asked that I clear this with Houston Legal before setting them up In addition I want to see if Houston CreditLegal will be reviewing this counterparty for US products as well Please let me know as soon as you can Thank You Imelda Frayre Forwarded by Imelda FrayreLONECT on Alan NRON To Imelda CT cc ECT London Credit Enron London EOL Product Control CT Subject Re New Counterparty President Fellows of Harvard College Approved for financial metal products only with collateral MGS Code IVY To Justin CT ECT London Credit Enron Europe Global CounterParty cc Enron London EOL Product Control CT EOL Marketing CT Lindsay F nron Hamish M nron Diana CT Alan nron Britta CT Alex CT Robert CT Chris CT Subject New Counterparty President Fellows of Harvard College Hi Weve received a PA registration form from President Fellows of Harvard College for EnronOnline Ive entered the customer details in the customer database saccess database Please review and confirm via return email once approval is completed Attached is the PA registration form for your review Regards Imelda Frayre Forwarded by Imelda FrayreLONECT on London Fax System To Enron London EOL Product Control CT cc Subject New fax received Likely sender You have received a new fax from The image contains pages

Re New Counterparty President Fellows of Harvard College Cc to hear from you guys on this before I send it out TanaLeslie I need to get an official approval from Legal Houston PCG I need to know if Houston CreditLegal will be reviewing for US products Please let me know Imelda Forwarded by Imelda FrayreLONECT on From Imelda Frayre on To Tana CT Leslie CT Claudia CT Lisa CT Karen O nron Paul CT Sitara AccessI rejected your security request because you already had access to Sitara I just modified your existing security profile by removing your access to the East and granting you access to the Central desk In order for the change to be effective you will need to get completely out of all open Sitara applications and get back in If you have any questions please call me at x Imelda Frayre

Sitara AccessI rejected your security request because you already had access to Sitara I just modified your existing security profile by removing your access to the East and granting you access to the Central desk In order for the change to be effective you will need to get completely out of all open Sitara applications and get back in If you have any questions please call me at x Imelda Frayre

Sitara AccessI rejected your security request because you already had access to Sitara I just modified your existing security profile by removing your access to the East and granting you access to the Central desk In order for the change to be effective you will need to get completely out of all open Sitara applications and get back in If you have any questions please call me at x Imelda Frayre

EPNGBLANCOhas completed creating the AVG BLANCO meter on the EPNGBLANCO zone The physical location server has been bounced and in order to see it in Sitara you will have to close all open Sitara applications including the Launch Pad and get back in If you have any questions please call me at x Bob the new portfolios that your group will need to monitor to track these new BLANCO and AVG BLANCO transactions are listed below You can open these portfolios in Deal Manager or Deal Ticker Deal Confirm EPNGBLANCO Deal Confirm EPNGAVGBLANCO Imelda Frayre Forwarded by Imelda FrayreHOUECT on AM Imelda Frayre AM To Patti CT Tori CT Jane M CT Sylvia A CT Faye CT Richard CT Torrey CT Bob CT Jennifer CT Dianne J CT Scott CT cc Subject EPNGBLANCOBLANCO Just wanted to let everyone know about the changes that will be made in the upcoming weeks to the EPNGBlancoBlanco meter Currently Blanco is an active pool facility that is traded by the West desk In order to allow the Deal Confirmations group to identify which trades require special handling language in the confirm we have all decided to create a second meter with the same data reference number in Global Facilities Doing this will serve three purposes First of all creating a second meter on the same data reference number allows users to see two separate meters in Sitara without affecting the way that physical location is nominated to the pipe since all they receive is the data reference number The change will also allow the Product Controls Group to create multiple products in EOL with different pricing terms on the same physical point In addition it will temporarily resolve the issue the Deal Confirmation is currently experiencing in segregating the confirmations that need special language I will be creating a portfolio that will include all new trades done at both BLANCO meters which will be monitored by the Deal Confirmation group I will make sure to contact all of you once the meter change has become effective When the change is completed expect to see the following locations available for selection in Sitara Pipe Zone Meter Product Description EPNG BLANCO BLANCO EP Blanco use the standard Delivery Location field and add flag Special Handling Nomination Cycle language EPNG BLANCO AVGBLANCO RESTRICTED use the standard Delivery Location field and add flag Special Handling Operational Constraints language Please call me if you have any questions Imelda Frayre x

EPNGBLANCOBLANCOwanted to let everyone know about the changes that will be made in the upcoming weeks to the EPNGBlancoBlanco meter Currently Blanco is an active pool facility that is traded by the West desk In order to allow the Deal Confirmations group to identify which trades require special handling language in the confirm we have all decided to create a second meter with the same data reference number in Global Facilities Doing this will serve three purposes First of all creating a second meter on the same data reference number allows users to see two separate meters in Sitara without affecting the way that physical location is nominated to the pipe since all they receive is the data reference number The change will also allow the Product Controls Group to create multiple products in EOL with different pricing terms on the same physical point In addition it will temporarily resolve the issue the Deal Confirmation is currently experiencing in segregating the confirmations that need special language I will be creating a portfolio that will include all new trades done at both BLANCO meters which will be monitored by the Deal Confirmation group I will make sure to contact all of you once the meter change has become effective When the change is completed expect to see the following locations available for selection in Sitara Pipe Zone Meter Product Description EPNG BLANCO BLANCO EP Blanco use the standard Delivery Location field and add flag Special Handling Nomination Cycle language EPNG BLANCO AVGBLANCO RESTRICTED use the standard Delivery Location field and add flag Special Handling Operational Constraints language Please call me if you have any questions Imelda Frayre x
